reviewText: my 3 year old son loves Rescue Bots but we can only watch it on Netflix or You Tube.  He was so excited when this came in the mail.
My 3 year old is in love with rescue bots and really enjoyed all of the dinosaur episodes together.

My son is a transformers fanatic, and this was a surprise for doing so well at potty training.  He loves this movie, as it contains his two favorite things (Transformers and Dinosaurs).  Would definitely purchase again...in fact I probably will purchase again soon because my son also doesn't understand that "playing" the the DVD's ruins them.  Wish me luck!

-Hannah

My son got into Transformers while bonding with my husband. We noticed Rescue Bots on Netflix, and decided to give it a try; For Easter this year we decided that we would purchase all the rescue bots dvds so my son could watch them while he is visiting his grandparents. This show contains a lot of action to keep my son entertained during long trips.

My husband and kids love this show!!

Episodes:
1. Land Before Prime
2. Big Game
3. Quarry vs. Quarry
4. Did You See What I Thaw?
5. The Attack Of Humungado

Apporx. run time:110 minutes

Only 4 stars since they continue to put repeat episodes on each DVD release.

It would be awesome if they sold this show by seasons, and not just random episodes, so we could get more episodes at a time and watch them in order.
My son is addicted to the rescue bots, these dvds work perfect in the car! Glad we bought them for our 5 day drive!
Perfect for my son! He loves it. It was packaged and protected perfectly!
Our 4 year old grandson is a dinosaur fan and a rescue bot fan.  This is the perfect stocking stuffer to bring smiles to his face this Christmas.
This is literally all my kids want to watch!
My 4 year old grandson loves these.
